mapper.insert: insert into gamelist (gameid, title, developer, developercountry, publisher, publishercountry, seriesname, seriesnumber, genre, imgpath, price, releasedate, description) values (#{ Game.gameId }, #{ Game.title }, #{ Game.developer }, #{ Game.developerCountry }, #{ Game.publisher }, #{ Game.publisherCountry }, #{ Game.seriesName }, #{ Game.seriesNumber }, #{ Game.genre }, #{ Game.imgPath }, #{ Game.price }, #{ Game.releaseDate }, #{ Game.description })
